price: Pharaoh said, “Did we not bring you up as a child among us, and you stayed with us several years of your life?
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدٗا وَلَبِثۡتَ فِينَا مِنۡ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
